author: Bhaal22
body:
RunspaceConfiguration still mentionned in RunspacePoolInternal ctor API documentation
Removed 2 obsolete test files

Those 2 files should even not compile.

 #4942

comments.author: Bhaal22
comments.body:
Indeed. I do not think you compile them ... otherwise they should fail for a couple of weeks.
Initially I removed them ... then I just dediced to remove reference to RunspaceConfiguration and update the  AutomationEngine construction with the right parameters.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @Bhaal22 I think the changes to the test are correct, separate from this PR, someone should understand if that test code is still relevant if so, get it running.

comments.author: Bhaal22
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT do you mean you would like to have 2 PRs?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @Bhaal22 no, I think it's fine to have these changes as part of a single PR.  I'm suggesting that investigating the utility of that test code is separate from this PR.

title: References to RunspaceConfiguration still present
